layout.text: Lineman Solutions is a business I started to develop specialized tools for the demands of the line industry. Bucket Knuckles was created to provide attachment and organization points inside a bucket and eliminate the hazards resulting from objects hanging outside a bucket or ariel device. It is designed to hang off of two standard size bucket hooks and is capable of supporting 50 pounds continuously. There are also options for placing a step removal pigtail socket and a flip socket in the device because they are notorious for ripping out tool board pockets.
